document_data.name: Perter
document_data.mainbody:
'''Perter''' was a renowned fletcher-merchant from the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Greetings to thee, fair customer. Perter bids thee welcome to his shop and good fortune upon thy negotiations. Dost thou care to peruse my inventory of fine missile weapons?''|Perter}}
document_data.Description: Galoomp was a portly man with light skin. He spoke politely in a proper manner and talked about himself in third person.
document_data.History: Perter shared a workshop with a fellow merchant and a smith named [[Arnolinus]]. Their store could be found in the grand market in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]] â€“ [[Waukeen's Promenade]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}. Some of the [[enchanted]] missiles Perter was creating at the time included ''[[arrows of biting]]'', ''[[arrows of dispelling]]'', ''[[arrows of fire]]'', ''[[arrows of ice]]'', and ''[[bolts of biting]]''. He also carried a stock of mundane missile weapons, [[bow]]s, and several ''[[potions of infravision]]'' and ''[[potions of strength]]''.
